message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you this amazing product for $2000000. It's a once-in-a-lifetime opportunity! Let me know what you think.
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1800000. That's the highest I'm willing to go.

Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $1800000 isn't quite enough for me to consider. I'm willing to come down to $1900000, but that's my final offer. Let me know if you're interested, otherwise I'll have to consider other options.
I'm getting close to my limit, but I'm still not comfortable with $1900000. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $1850000. That's my final offer.
